answers.answer: I stand corrected but the values you gave appear to correlate with a thyroid test. Fasting insulin levels are usually less than 25u/ml. This  would make me perform more specific tests to see if this is an error such as an A1c test.Was the 101 glucose level at fasting? If so, 101 is considered prediabetic.Please consult with your doctor for a proper review/analysis of your test scores.

question: Good afternoon,I recently saw my doctor regarding a number of odd symptoms including terrible fatigue.  He ordered a fasting insuling test.  The results show a fasting insulin level of 227 uIU/ML or 1555.68 pmol/l.  My MD has not taken the time to review my results yet.  This level seem very high.  Is this indicative of diabetes?  My glucose level was 101.Thanks very much.Curt
title: Fasting Insuling Level Very High
